subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The three-team trade that landed Oklahoma City Enes Kanter and rid the team of Kendrick Perkins could be among the most significant in terms of the Western Conference playoff race.
snippet: The three-team trade that landed Oklahoma City Enes Kanter and rid the team of Kendrick Perkins could be among the most significant in terms of the Western Conference playoff race.
